definition: individual/this/that/size/classifier for people or objects in general
erhua variant of 挨個|挨个[ai1 ge4]
a person of short stature/a short person
stupid great hulk of a man
erhua variant of 單個|单个[dan1 ge5]

sentences.english: I felt uncomfortable, and even afraid, of going out by myself.
sentences.chinese: 我很是不爽，甚至都害怕自個兒出去買東西了。

sentences.english: Want to manure the whole place over, scabby soil.
sentences.chinese: 這片土壤太貧瘠了，想整個兒施一通肥。

sentences.english: Mr. Ho has at least 17 acknowledged children from the four women he and others call his wives.
sentences.chinese: 何鴻燊的四房太太爲他至少生育了17個兒女。

sentences.english: The big dragoon was as helpless as a baby.
sentences.chinese: 這龍騎兵大個兒象嬰兒似的毫無辦法。

sentences.english: No one should be alone in their old age, he thought.
sentences.chinese: 誰也不該上了年紀獨個兒待着，他想。

sentences.english: I was small, Asian and geeky.
sentences.chinese: 我有著亞洲人的小個兒頭。

sentences.english: Battle, in order to save a little girl, big heroic sacrifice.
sentences.chinese: 戰鬥中，大個兒爲了救一個小女孩，壯烈犧牲了。

sentences.english: Is it at all possible that he alone can drink ten bottles of beer?
sentences.chinese: 難道他真的能獨個兒飲十瓶啤酒嗎？

sentences.english: I hate to see you standing about by youself in this stupid manner.
sentences.chinese: 我可不願意看到你獨個兒這麼傻里傻氣的站在這。

sentences.english: If you travel alone in that forest, you may run into danger.
sentences.chinese: 如果你獨個兒在那片森林裏行走，你會遇到危險的。

sentences.english: He reportedly divvied up key spheres of interest, such as oil, among his 6 sons.
sentences.chinese: 據稱，他的6個兒子瓜分了石油等國家命脈產業。

sentences.english: Like all the short guys would become receivers, right?
sentences.chinese: 就象讓所有矮個兒都當外接手，對吧？

sentences.english: Other things are equal, a tall man is more respected than a short man.
sentences.chinese: 其他的條件相同的話，高個兒比矮個兒更受人尊重。

sentences.english: Other things are equal, a tall man is more respected than a short man.
sentences.chinese: 其他的條件相同的話，高個兒比矮個兒更受人尊重。

sentences.english: The big man crowded the child out of his way.
sentences.chinese: 那個大個兒將小孩擠開。

sentences.english: It's usually the big guy who's alone in the corner.
sentences.chinese: 通常是大個兒獨自在角落裏。

definition: all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: to ask a question, already knowing the answer
child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
variant of 敢做敢當|敢做敢当[gan3 zuo4 gan3 dang1]
partner for dating/a date (boyfriend or girlfriend)
lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
